name: Woo Elastic Slideshow
author: omikant, wptutorialspoint

sections.description:
Woo Elastic Slideshow Plugin is for woocommerce Products.

Shortcode Options

As of version 1.0, Please use ‘[elastic-slideshow]’ or <?php echo do_shortcode('[elastic-slideshow]'); ?> shortcodes.

Credits

This plugin was written by WPTUTORIALS POINT Team.
sections.installation:
The easy way:

  1. Go to the Plugins Menu in WordPress
  2. Search for “Woo Elastic Slideshow”
  3. Click ‘Install’
  4. Activate the plugin

Manual Installation

  1. Download the plugin file from this page and unzip the contents
  2. Upload the woo-elastic-slideshow folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the woo-elastic-slideshow plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

The easy way:

  1. Go to the Plugins Menu in WordPress
  2. Search for “Woo Elastic Slideshow”
  3. Click ‘Install’
  4. Activate the plugin

Manual Installation

  1. Download the plugin file from this page and unzip the contents
  2. Upload the woo-elastic-slideshow folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the woo-elastic-slideshow plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

The Slider Shortcode

Place the [elastic-slideshow] shortcode in a Page or Post

Can I insert the carousel into a WordPress template instead of a page?

Absolutely – you just need to use the do_shortcode WordPress function. For example:

short_description: Woo Elastic Slideshow Plugin is for woocommerce Products.
